message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
How about we meet a bit closer to the middle? This offer accounts for you getting the first proposal.
I'll meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more for going first
Time is running out, and the pot is shrinking. This is my final offer above 500,000 for you. Let's be reasonable.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me above 500,000, but I think we can do better than that
The deal's getting worse for both of us, Alice. I need to see more than half to make this worthwhile. This offer is a compromise, take it before inflation eats into it further.
I understand that time is running out, but I'm not willing to take less than half yet. Let's meet in the middle one more time
